findings.title: User data from `zipname in install.py:128` is used in `install.py:130` for file operations.
findings.description:
The product specifies permissions for a security-critical resource in a way that allows that resource to be read or modified by unintended actors.

## Additional information

**[File Write](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/732.html)**

details.name: User data from `zipname in install.py:128` is used in `install.py:130` for file operations.

findings.description:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.

## Additional information

**[Env Var](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/312.html)**
